citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
11:10am-11:20am on 25-Apr-19.
Facility representative indicated unavailability for inspection.

narrative:
